title: Caramelised banana pancakes
ingredients: ['For the pancakes', '170g (6 oz) plain flour', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '2 eggs, beaten', '425ml (3/4 pt) milk', '1 tablespoon oil', 'For the filling', '110g (4 oz) butter', '110g (4 oz) sugar (demerara or granulated)', '4 bananas, sliced', '2 freshly squeezed lemons', 'whipped cream (optional)']
